text:
為了保護您的個人資料安全，本通知信將不顯示訂單明細。
更詳盡的資訊請點選下方連結查看訂單明細：
[redacted_url]
訂單QRcode(供核銷使用)
感謝您使用「深澳鐵道自行車網站」的會員服務，祝您搭乘愉快！
「深澳鐵道自行車網站」客服中心 敬上
-- ※ 此信件為系統發出信件，請勿直接回覆，感謝您的配合。 謝謝！ ※
trans:
In order to protect the security of your personal information, this notification letter will not display the order details.
For more detailed information, please click the link below to view the order details:
[redacted_url]
Order QR code (for verification)
Thank you for using the membership service of the "Shen'ao Rail Bike Website" and wish you a pleasant ride!
Sincerely, Customer Service Center of "Shen'ao Rail Bike Website"
-- ※ This letter is sent by the system. Please do not reply directly. Thank you for your cooperation. Thanks! ※
